name: Tales of Zyphoria
description:
--RECOMMENDED PLAYED IN FULL SCREEN--

An adventure full of action, and a story so rich you'd cry whenever you hear someone talking about it! Welcome to the Tales of Zyphoria. Explore the vast world map populated with bustling towns, interesting characters, and devastating monsters!

--CONTROLS--

WASD - Move

E / LMB - Interact or Attack

--ABOUT--

This game was made in a week for the 2019 Community Game Jam. Watch how this game was made on the MashUp Games YouTube channel (COMING SOON).
